journal-title-group.journal-title: Nebraska Journal of Economics and Business

publisher.publisher-name: College of Business Administration of the University of Nebraska-Lincoln

title-group.article-title: Economic and Business Journals: Policies, Performance, and the Impact of Submission Fees

p.mixed-citation: Sanford V. Berg, "Increasing the Efficiency of the Economics Journal Market," Journal of Economic Literature 9 (September, 1971), pp. 799-812.

John A. Weber, "Economics Journals: Policies, Trends, and Problems," Southern Economic Journal 38 (April, 1972), pp. 559-565.

Berg, op. cit. ;
